verses.verse: By <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H5104>rivers<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> we sat <S%H3427>down,<s%> <S%H1571>yea,<s%> we <S%H1058>wept,<s%> when we <S%H2142>remembered<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H6726>Zion.<s%>
We <S%H8518>hanged<s%> our <S%H3658>harps<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H6155>willows<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> thereof.

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> they that carried us away <S%H7617>captive<s%> <S%H7592>required<s%> of us a <S%H1697>song;<s%> <S%H7892><s%> and they that <S%H8437>wasted<s%> us required of us <S%H8057>mirth,<s%> saying, <S%H7891>Sing<s%> us one of the <S%H4480>songs<s%> <S%H7892><s%> of <S%H6726>Zion.<s%>
If <S%H518><s%> I <S%H7911>forget<s%> thee, O <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> let my right <S%H3225>hand<s%> <S%H7911>forget<s%> her cunning.

If <S%H518><s%> I do <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2142>remember<s%> thee, let my <S%H3956>tongue<s%> <S%H1692>cleave<s%> to the roof of my <S%H2441>mouth;<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> I <S%H5927>prefer<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H5921>above<s%> my <S%H7218>chief<s%> <S%H8057>joy.<s%>

Remember, <S%H2142><s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H123>Edom<s%> <S%H853><s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%> who <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6168>Raze<s%> it, <S%H6168>raze<s%> it, even <S%H5704>to<s%> the <S%H3247>foundation<s%> thereof.

O <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> who art to be <S%H7703>destroyed;<s%> <S%H835>happy<s%> shall he be, that <S%H7945>rewardeth<s%> <S%H7999><s%> thee <S%H854>as<s%> <S%H1576><s%> thou hast <S%H7945>served<s%> <S%H1580><s%> us.
Happy <S%H835><s%> shall he be, that <S%H7945>taketh<s%> <S%H270><s%> and <S%H5310>dasheth<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy little <S%H5768>ones<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H5553>stones.<s%>
